title: One of the partner of Saigontourist its array of alternative service
text:
Travel Articles | October 15, 2015 
Here, every guest will enjoy a well-appointed room or a luxurious room with plenty of room to live, to work or just to relax. Our warm inviting atmosphere, congenial staff and host of fine services he... 
Here, every guest will enjoy a well-appointed room or a luxurious room with plenty of room to live, to work or just to relax. Our warm inviting atmosphere, congenial staff and host of fine services help to make every stay the most enjoyable one. Our philosophy is to satisfy our guest in every possible way from the first time. You only have to bring yourself and time to relax and we will make sure that your holidays and business trip will be comfortable. Strategically located in the heart of Cantho city. Saigon-Cantho Hotel offers easy access to financial and government offices, shopping and entertainment areas, and Ninh Kieu quay in walking distance. Where you the qualitiy of services make your life truly worthwhile. Air conditioning is provided for added comfort and for your convenience. En-suite bathroom facilities include Bathroom among other amenities. When staying in their rooms, guests will have Cable/satellite television and Telephone for entertainment during their stay. The hotel's fitness centre ensures you can keep to your exercise routine. Take in a game of tennis on one of the hotel's courts for a bit of exercise. Don't miss a soothing escape at the hotel's spa with its wide selection of treatments. A massage can be arranged at the hotel for rest and relaxation. 

Hau Giang Hotel Can Tho is a 3-star hotel which located in the heart of city’s Ninh Kieu. Hau Giang Hotel is the most ideal place for tourists and business traveler whenever coming to Can Tho. There are many kind of rooms, are equipped with all model, luxury amenities In European & Asian style. With decorative harmony cozy elegance will give you a warm feeling like being in your home. Hau Giang Hotel is equipped with services for customers such as telephone, refrigerator water hot - cold, cable TV, internet wifi,floorboard, especially conference room seating for 120 participants,….serving breakfast on the 06 floor with professional service staff in hotels and catering. Modern guestrooms and suites with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning can be found in Hau Giang Hotel. Located in Can Tho, the hotel features its own restaurant and provides free parking. Just 300 metres from the ancient Can Tho Market, Hau Giang Hotel is 400 metres from Ninh Kieu Pier and Can Tho Museum. Can Tho Boat Station is 500 metres away. Cai Rang Floating Market is 5.8 km from the hotel. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, seating area, desk and minibar. Private bathroom includes a bath or shower and free toiletries. At Hau Giang Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk and terrace. Other facilities offered include a ticket service and tour desk. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
